components.description:
Leaves, as fluttering in a spring or summer breeze. Depicted as one or two green, almond-shaped leaves, with gray or blue motion lines, as if swirling in the air or as the wind blowing through the trees.

May be used to represent the season of fall/autumn, trees, and nature more generally.

Not to be confused with üçÇ Fallen Leaf, though their applications may overlap.
components.title: Leaf Fluttering in Wind

May be used to represent the season of fall/autumn, trees, and nature more generally.

title: Leaf Fluttering in Wind

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Plant symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A leaf (or leaves in the Apple artwork) fluttering in a gentle breeze, falling to the ground. Leaf Fluttering in Wind was approved as part o http://emojipedia.org/leaf-fluttering-in-wind/
emoji_net_data.name: leaf fluttering in wind

bn:00098604a: Abounding in or exposed to the wind or breezes

bn:00087976v: Move to a lower position under the effect of gravity.
To move to a lower position under the effect of gravity.
Descend in free fall under the influence of gravity
To descend in free fall due to the effect of gravity.

bn:00002216n: Wind, while simply "the flow of air or other gases that compose an atmosphere," has since ancient times been a significant and pervasive metaphor and symbol in human discourse.
Wind is the flow of gases on a large scale.
The motion of air relative to the earth's surface; usually means horizontal air motion, as distinguished from vertical motion.
Air currents can be caused by differences in temperature, pressure, or impurity concentration.
Real or perceived movement of atmospheric air usually caused by convection or differences in air pressure.
Flow of gases or air on a large scale
Air moving (sometimes with considerable force) from an area of high pressure to an area of low pressure

bn:00035596n: The main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants, usually consisting of a flat green blade attached to the stem directly or by a stalk.
Anything resembling the leaf of a plant.
Organ of a vascular plant, composing its foliage
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant and is the principal lateral appendage of the stem.
The main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants
A major part of a leaf
A structure at the base of a leaf's petiole that partly surrounds or protect the stem or another organ that it subtends.
The leaves of a plant together.

apple_vendor_description: The 'leaf fluttering in wind' emoji on Apple devices captures a moment of natural transition with exquisite artistry. A single, elegantly shaped leaf, rendered with vibrant color and soft, realistic lighting, appears to be caught in a gentle breeze.  Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading give the leaf a lifelike quality, evoking feelings of change, autumn, or the ephemeral beauty of nature.  Its soft, rounded edges contribute to an overall sense of delicate movement, making it a beautiful visual metaphor for the passage of time or a shift in circumstances on your Apple device.
